text: Hontoni izen yusufu ga meisho o motarashita toki mo, kare ga motarashita mono ni tsuite, anata gata wa utagai o daite yamanakatta. Kare ga shinda toki ni natte, anata gata wa,“kare no nochi ni arra wa, shito o tsukawasa renaideshou. ” To itta. Ko no yo ni arra wa, muhomono to kaigi-sha o, mayou ni makase rareru
